endpoints.name: prompt
endpoints.value:
I want you act as a proofreader. I will provide you texts and I would like you
to review them for any spelling, grammar, or punctuation errors. Once you have
finished reviewing the text, provide me with any necessary corrections or
suggestions for improve the text.

endpoints.name: metadata
suggestions: Run the 'Act as a Proofreader' scenario as described in the prompt.
Customize the 'Act as a Proofreader' instructions for a new use case.
Summarize key steps from the 'Act as a Proofreader' prompt.
